SELECT su.nick_name, su.phonenumber, dce.dept_name, dce.dept_change, dce.examine_time, dce.create_time, dce.user_id, dce.dept_change_id FROM dept_change_examine dce LEFT JOIN sys_user su ON dce.user_id = su.user_id where dce.flag=1
and su.nick_name like CONCAT('%',#{queryBO.nickName},'%')
and su.phonenumber like CONCAT('%',#{queryBO.phonenumber},'%')
and dce.dept_change_id =#{queryBO.deptId}
order by dce.create_time desc
